amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part B of House Report 116-2 to increase funding for the Marianas food stamps block grant by $15 million to cover the cost of households, not previously eligible for aid, who remain in need of assistance because of continuing income loss after Typhoon Mangkhut and Super Typhoon Yutu.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sablan amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Sablan.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sablan amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
